Html:
Scenario: Go to blog post editing and try saving the entry.
Expected result: Post saved.
Actual result: Exception.
Details:
Exception: Unable to cast object of type 'System.String[]' to type 'System.String'.
File: PostModelBinder
Line: 22

P.S.
I've seen this kind of exception not only here, but while trying to edit site settings as well.

Yah, we've seen that problem too.  I thought I fixed it, but I may have fixed one of the other occurrances and hadn't noticed that one.  Not sure what changed to make the type come in wrong, but we'll look into it.  Thanks!
